divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were attending a "pig-picking" outdoor roast at my friend's home off of Hwy 96. We were asked to drive to a local quick-mart to pick up several needed items. Went to the store, then turned onto Hwy 96 coming back. A glint caught my eye in the car, so I looked. There was a vehicle slowly rising from a hill @ a third of a mile to my right. I asked my wife, Cindy, if she saw it and she said yes. We pulled onto the shoulder and stopped. WE DIDN'T HAVE A CAMERA! The vehicle's base was an upside-down saucer with a round "turret" on top. It slowly rose from the hill, hovered, then accelerated at amazing speed angling upwards, but doing so in a zig-zag pattern until it disappeared into high altitude clouds a good 3 miles down Hwy 96. We returned to the festivities and I decided to tell the proprietor of the party what we saw. He poo-pood it, so we decided not to mention it to anyone else. I forgot to mention that the entire surface of the vehicle looked like polished aluminum.
Summary: Saw object slowly rise from hill, then zig-zag at high speed away
trends: There have been 72 other sightings in Nashville
There were no other sightings in Nashville on or around August 27th 1994
